objects.description: [OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0352) has variants that check a number of system parameters to see if it is being run on real hardware or in a virtual machine environment, such as sysctl hw.model.(Citation: ESET OceanLotus macOS April 2019)(Citation: 20 macOS Common Tools and Techniques)

external_references.description: Dumont, R.. (2019, April 9). OceanLotus: macOS malware update. Retrieved April 15, 2019.
Phil Stokes. (2021, February 16). 20 Common Tools & Techniques Used by macOS Threat Actors & Malware. Retrieved August 23, 2021.
